title: Peep Shoe, Who Run The World? Olds! 3.9.20
itunes:title: Peep Shoe, Who Run The World? Olds! 3.9.20
description:
In episode 585, Jack and special guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by Chris Crofton to discuss the Democratic primaries, why politicians are so old, Katy Perry's pregnancy, the Peeps x Crocs collab, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Biden Praises Sanders, Snubs Clinton: "No One Questions Bernie's Authenticity"
  2. ‘Life After Bernie’: The Young Left Braces for Disappointment in 2020
  3. Why Do Such Elderly People Run America?
  4. Katy Perry announces she and fiancé Orlando Bloom are expecting a child
  5. Peeps And Crocs Dropped A Collab And It's The Perfect Thing To Add To Your Easter Basket
  6. WATCH: I'm The Baby, Gotta Love Me (Music Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
